Package org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.util.cli

Class CommandsParser

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.util.cli.CommandsParser
public class CommandsParser extends Object
Automatically converts a list of arguments and options from the command line based on a list of (sub)commands. The input is expected to match the format "command [ARGUMENTS] [OPTIONS]". Each command is a separate class implementing Runnable and annotated with @CliCommand. The fields within the command class shall be annotated with @CliArgument or @CliOption to define required arguments in a fixed order and/or additional options.

  • Method Details

    • parseArguments

      public final Runnable parseArguments(String[] args) throws org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException
      Parses a list of arguments and selects the matching command class and returns it. Furthermore, it sets all values into the fields of the command class according to provided @CliArgument and @CliOption annotations.
      Parameters:
      args - the plain args of the command line input
      Throws:
      org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException - if the given input command line is wrong formatted (e.g., missing arguments)
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given arguments are wrongly formatted (e.g., refer to missing files)

    • printHelp

      public final void printHelp()
      Prints a help screen to standard output.

    • printHelp

      public final void printHelp(PrintWriter printWriter)
      Prints a help screen to provided PrintWriter.
      Parameters:
      printWriter - writer to output help to

    • usageHint

      public CommandsParser usageHint(String usageHint, String header, String footer)
      This method is used to define a usage hint for the respective ArgumentsOptionsParser.
      Parameters:
      usageHint - the hint to be set
      header - header for the hint
      Returns:
      the object to chain further methods
